articles.title: EU takes up option to buy 150 million more Moderna COVID-19 shots - GMA News Online
articles.description: The European Union has decided to take up an option under a supply contract with drugmaker Moderna that allows the bloc to order 150 million additional COVID-19 vaccines produced by the US biotech firm, the EU Commission said on Tuesday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS — The European Union has decided to take up an option under a supply contract with drugmaker Moderna that allows the bloc to order 150 million additional COVID-19 vaccines produced by the US… [+1344 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19 Delta Variant Threatens to Set Back Europe’s Recovery - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Europe is rushing to vaccinate as many people as possible before the variant takes hold
articles.content:
The Delta variant of the coronavirus is spreading rapidly across continental Europe, raising the risk of a rebound in infections and a delay to the regions economic comeback.

articles.title: Passive smoking increases arthritis risk - New Telegraph Newspaper
